item.title: 마이크로닷(Microdot) - 오마주
item.description:
I hope
I made it clear
My verse
clears the atmosphere
My words
keep me real
As I turn back
the steering wheel
Of time
as I pay homage
Respect
the artists
That got me rhyming
moment of silence
The creators
of 1 2 mic check
Before you
kill the stage
1 2
mic test
Even though I wasn’t
at the time
I thought
I might stress
Of the thought
of killing the booth
One day
mind set
Now my flows doper
now my dreams closer
And my minds
still sober
Maintaining focus
I want more than best
I gotta be way
beyond the greatest
Beyond
what Lebron James was
Of course
I was speaking
In future reference
the year Microdot
Had released
the illest record
Instrumentals bangin’
pure quality presented
I’d like say thank you
for you blessings
These are
my influences
Hip hops
intuition
The game flipped
like a pancake
With the road
to riches
Now let me
list the greatest
The frontline of
papers and magazines
Out of hip hops
generation
These are
my influences
Hip hops
intuition
The game flipped
like a pancake
With the road
to riches
Now let me
list the greatest
The frontline of
papers and magazines
Of our hip hop
generation
Perfect essence
illmatic
To stillmatic
the black album
The dynasty
few legends
Rappers were
monkey flipping
While the takeover had
lead me
To dead presidents
to represent me
After either crowned
the games ceaser
Named hip hops
potential 1 leader
So they asked
could the real
Slim shady
please stand up
As he lost himself
in my eardrums
Then the game lifted
with Kanye West
The D O C umentary
what’s next
College dropout
it wouldn’t get far
Then Jesus walked
after carter 1 dropped
Then a star was born
J cole world
Weezy signed drizzy
digged the bad girl
Then Chris Breezy
rocked it
Same bad girl
then more
Beef popped off
in this cold world
2pac Dre Snoop
Fat Joe
50 The Neptunes
Biggie Smalls
Swizz Beats jin
black star Rick Ross
DMX T.I.P
Sean Diddy Combs

my influences
Hip hops
intuition

like a pancake
With the road
to riches
Now let me list
the greatest

papers and magazines

generation

Hip hops
intuition

like a pancake
With the road

Now let me
list the greatest
The frontline of
papers and magazines
Of our hip hop
generation
Now let me state
the gunners
That have been
around
Mac to wiz
to Kendrick to Asap
B O B to cudi
yeah they hold it down
Tyga Lecrae
Wale Mayback
These are
the artists
That I listen too
daily basis
A hundred phrases made
of one word
Xamn
it’s crazy
Growing up
life was tough
At times holy musics
what I ran to
At a young stage
of life
A young state
of mind
As I press
rewind the time
Memory lane
flashes
The beat
and pen ignite
As the words
flow deeper
I’m trying to
catch a breather
As I stress
to exceed
Expectations
of a dreamer
I got two
blood brothers
Biggest of them all
Blasto and Sanchez
The reason
I’m involved
In this rapping
business
My biggest influences
this is my view of
Hip hops
intuition

intuition

item.title: 마이크로닷(Microdot),산체스(팬텀) - Love Letter
